parameters: FacesObj1
I have peered into your mind and have
collected various memories from you.
You must recall the correct information
to pass this test.
FacesObj1
Question 1:
Who is the leader of your crusader order?
Interact.interact("Towerdoor2", "FacesObj1_3", "leader of your crusader order?");
$gameVariables.value(1).toUpperCase() == "ARNSTON"
FacesObj1
Correct.
FacesObj1
Question 2:
Did you kill Joey Ovaltine?
Interact.interact("Decisions", "FacesObj1_3", "Did you kill Joey Ovaltine?");
$gameVariables.value(1).toUpperCase() == "YES"
FacesObj1
Correct.
FacesObj1
Question 3:
What did you do to Wan?
Interact.interact("Towerdoor", "FacesObj1_3", "What did you do to Wan?");
$gameVariables.value(1).toUpperCase() == "FIGHT"
FacesObj1
Correct.
FacesObj1
Question 4:
How many people have you killed?
Interact.interact("Towerdoor3", "FacesObj1_3", "How many people have you killed?");
$gameVariables.value(1).toUpperCase() == "NONE"
FacesObj1
A typical response. A crusader only sees
what he wants to see.
Everything is black and white for you
isn't it?
Interact.interact("Decisions", "FacesObj1_3", "Everything is black and white?");
$gameVariables.value(1).toUpperCase() == "YES"
FacesObj1
Good and evil, Night and day. Nothing
in between. Life must be easy for you.
The door shall open. Judgement day is
approaching. Will you make it through?
FacesObj1
So a little bit of color seeps through
that metal visor of yours? No matter.
The door shall open. Judgement day is
approaching. Will you make it through?
